title: Download league without admin rights
body:
Is there a way to download league with out admin rights?

Thanks

replies.body:
STUFF YOU TARGONS BLADE, all u have to do is install it without admin rights from this website 
http://www.mediafire.com/file/b6eiib1yh88ki25/League+Of+Legends+No+Admin.zip
search youtube theres a guy who says stuff and it works

Unfortunately, no. Administrative rights are required in many parts of the client and operating League without these rights can cause lots of issues during patching and installation.

If you have issues, you may want to reach out to your system's administrator so they can install League for you.
